confidence.description: The confidence level of the detection.
confidence.title: confidence

end.description: The end position of the poisitional detection.
end.title: end

group.description: The group the detection belongs to.
group.title: group

label.description: The label returned by the model.
label.title: label

positional.description: Tell if the detection is positional.
positional.title: positional

raw_score.description: The raw score of the detection retuned by the model.
raw_score.title: raw_score

score.description: The normalized score of the detection against its confidence level thresholds. Between 0 and 1 as low <0.33, 0.33<=Medium<0.66, high >=0.66.
score.title: score

start.description: The start position of the poisitional detection.
start.title: start
